ruling: - After activating [[Delta Attacker]], if you have 3 different monsters with the same name, [[Delta Attacker]] still only applies to the 3 monsters of the same name you had when you activated [[Delta Attacker]].
- If 1 of the 3 monsters is removed from the field, [[Delta Attacker]]'s effect still applies to the other 2.
- If [[Non-Spellcasting Area]] is activated after [[Delta Attacker]], the effect of [[Delta Attacker]] is negated.
